summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5568 for the improvement of Occidental Avenue, from Holgate Street to Lander Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 72724, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
